ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the inputs. I have spoke with Tech Supt and they seem to agree. I hope to at least get a Ressurection out of this.  I dont mind the death really,
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the inputs. I have spoke with Tech Supt and they seem to agree.
I hope to at least get a Ressurection out of this. I dont mind the death
really, just wish it would be posted somewhere what the limitations of the
software is currently. Then these great mysteries would not kill us all the
time...or cost us many plat on training and spells that dont work. Or
trying to buy two identical spells and spending 6 plat each on them to find
out you can only get one scroll at a time...yes, the NPC merchant takes your
money but only gives one scroll.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:michael.r.mccartney2@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:02 AM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?


From: "McCartney, Michael R" <michael.r.mccartney2@...>

I agree with you. You should be able to cast spells on a docked boat.
Maybe they dont want the extra animation lagging the boat ride up? *shrugs*
But, yeah, I think we should at least be able to cast Gate while on a docked
boat...

Drev

> --
